CoinMixerUtil Class is engine class for CoinMixer applications

    • finalize

      public void finalize()

    • httpGetAddressInfo

      public com.github.ikra1.coinmixerapp.Account httpGetAddressInfo​(java.lang.String address) throws java.lang.Exception
      makes http GET call to Jobcoin API adresses
      Parameters:
      address - JobCoin address
      Returns:
      Account object, which contains address info and all transactions for this address
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • httpPostTransaction

      public boolean httpPostTransaction​(java.lang.String fromAddress, java.lang.String toAddress, java.lang.String amount) throws java.lang.Exception
      makes http POST call to Jobcoin API transactions
      Parameters:
      fromAddress - JobCoin address from which JobCoins are moving
      toAddress - JobCoin address to which JobCoins are moving
      amount - JobCoin value of transaction
      Returns:
      true -transaction succeed, false - transaction failed
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • validateDestAccounts

      public boolean validateDestAccounts​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> destAccounts) throws java.lang.Exception
      validates destination addresses
      Parameters:
      destAccounts - set of JobCoin addresses
      Returns:
      true - addresses were not used before, false - at least one of them were used before
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • isAddressUsed

      public boolean isAddressUsed​(java.lang.String address, boolean checkMemory) throws java.lang.Exception
      checks if address was used before
      Parameters:
      address - JobCoin addresses
      checkMemory - indicates if check in memory for accumulated during session used addresses is needed
      Returns:
      boolean true - addresses were not used before, false - at least one of them were used before
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • isAddressUsedandBalanceAvailable

      public boolean isAddressUsedandBalanceAvailable​(java.lang.String address, boolean checkMemory) throws java.lang.Exception
      checks if address was used before and balance is greater than zero
      Parameters:
      address - JobCoin address
      checkMemory - indicates if check in memory for accumulated during session used addresses is needed
      Returns:
      true - address were used before and balance is greater than zero, false - otherwise
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • mix

      public void mix​(java.lang.String depositAddress, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> destAccounts) throws java.lang.Exception
      • takes entire available balance from deposit account and moves it to house account
      • calculates fee coefficient and adjust dispense balance
      • randomizes amount and time intervals for JobCoin dispenses
      • schedules dispense tasks for all destination accounts
      Parameters:
      depositAddress - JobCoin address the source for mixing
      destAccounts - set of destination addresses for mixing
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
